channel.title: NPC drop problem... Drops money EACH HIT
channel.description:
title says my problem, how do i make it not drop each hit but once it's killed?
I can't really remember where i put the code, though...

item.title: NPC drop problem... Drops money EACH HIT
item.dc:creator: @epic_demic epic_demic
item.description:
@epic_demic wrote:

could you tell me where your mistake was so that I could try to re-create it on my server? it would be a cool addition for a few monsters

Read full topic
item.source: NPC drop problem... Drops money EACH HIT

item.title: NPC drop problem... Drops money EACH HIT
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

wales 00:

Strange glitch, I haven’t come across something like that before. If I had the code you added somewhere I would be able to help but unfortunately I don’t. I just posted this because it’s strange.

Found it 

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 677) {
ItemHandler.addItem(995, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 15000, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

It was in NPChandler i think… but yeah… incase you wanted to see it. There it is.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drop problem... Drops money EACH HIT
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

ranger squad:

No, he means every time he hits the monster (red or blue splat) it drops money.

Yes, that’s what i mean:) But that helps with some other things as well. I believe i put the NPC’s drop in the wrong area… I don’t remember where i put it though. I’ll live, though.

Read full topic
